mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_LEVEL, MEM_STAT, MEM_HP, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADDR1, MEM_ADDR2, MEM_RDATE, MEM_RANK) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pass}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_level}, #{mem_stat}, #{mem_hp}, #{mem_zip}, #{mem_addr1}, #{mem_addr2}, SYSDATE, #{mem_rank})
INSERT INTO MEM_SELLER (MEM_ID, CORP_NAME, CORP_REG_HP, CORP_TEL_HP, CORP_FAX) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{corp_name}, #{corp_reg_hp}, #{corp_tel_hp}, #{corp_fax})
mapper.select: SELECT mem_id, corp_name, mem_name, corp_reg_hp, corp_tel_hp, mem_hp, mem_stat from MEMBER m LEFT JOIN mem_seller USING (mem_id) WHERE mem_level=2
